name: MBF Healthcare Partners
overview: MBF Healthcare Partners, LLC is a private equity firm specializing in acquisitions, leveraged buyouts, growth capital, and recapitalizations. It prefers investments in emerging healthcare services. The firm primarily invests in companies based in the United States. It seeks to invest in companies with enterprise values between $25 million and $100 million, having an EBITDA between $5 million and $20 million and annual revenues of over $5 million. The firm targets deal sizes of up to $300 million and also pursues larger transactions in partnership with other investors. It invests invests in the form of equity and seeks to acquire majority stakes in its portfolio companies. MBF Healthcare Partners, LLC was founded in August 2005 and is based in Coral Gables, Florida with an additional office in New York, New York .
